index.description: Index of the image in the input array

source.description: Original input string (URL or key-value reference)

key.description: Key used to store the processed image in the key-value store

url.description: Public URL of the processed image

width.description: Final width of the processed image in pixels

height.description: Final height of the processed image in pixels

format.description: Final output format (jpeg, png, webp, avif, gif)

sizeBytes.description: Size of the processed image in bytes
